data.name: Voxellands
data.detailed_description:
Official Discord | Website

OVERVIEW

Voxellands is a block-building sandbox game, which aims to take the creative aspect to a new level — features that are often only hinted at in other voxel productions by the modding community, here become the vanilla experience! What is more, they are accompanied by mechanics known from kingdom management simulators, roguelikes, and even ecological games.


Your epic journey starts in the wilderness and is focused on survival, but as you gather more resources and expand your territory, the game gradually adds a layer of kingdom management mixed with unlimited creative expression. Create your own blocky world by designing unique items, mobs, voxel textures, and vehicles. Invite citizens into your settlement, and have a meaningful impact on your environment by designing new species of evolving animals and plants.

Invite your friends to visit your "Voxelland" on-line. Not only will they be able to buy schematics from your shops, or interact with your citizens, but also rate your civilisation, so that it receives praise online and becomes a top community world.

FEATURES


  • Block-building

    - Create a home for yourself on an uninhabited island. Expand its territory. Place blocks by hand or with building schematics.

  • Creative sandbox

    - Give your world a distinctive flair by hand-painting your block textures. Design voxel decorations and items using the materials you find while exploring exotic and dangerous lands. Imbue them with magical properties or technological innovations.

  • Design your mobs

    - Bring life into your creations, and construct your own mobs. Allow them to grow, evolve, and thrive — ultimately creating an ecosystem that will make your settlement truly unique.

  • Vehicles

    - Build vehicles, from simple rafts, to flying ships. Use these to travel and trade with other civilisations.

  • Sky's the limit

    - Express your creativity with unlimited height limit for voxel creations.

  • Share your creations

    - Invite your friends to visit your world on-line.

data.short_description: Voxellands is the ultimate sandbox voxel experience — design items, hand-paint mobs, construct vehicles, invent machinery, weave magic. Explore. Gather resources. Create your world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: i5-2500 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: i5-2500 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1660 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 12.4 or later
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 12.4 or later
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
